
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

/*
 * To change this template, choose Tools | Templates and open the template in
 * the editor.
 */
/**
 *
 * @author geek_guY
 */
public class Main {

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        // TODO code application logic here
        BufferedReader bf = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));

        int t = Integer.parseInt(bf.readLine());
        while (t-- > 0) {
            String s[] = bf.readLine().split(" ");
            //System.out.println(getcoeff), Integer.parseInt(s[1])));
            int i1 = (Integer.parseInt(s[0]));
            int i2 = (Integer.parseInt(s[1]));
            int i3 = (Integer.parseInt(s[2]));
            int sum = Math.min(i1, i2);

             i1 = i1+i2;
            i2 = sum;
            //i1 %= i3;
            //i2 %= 142857;
            int arr[][] = new int[i1 + 1][i2 + 1];
            for (int x = 0; x < i1 + 1; x++) {
                arr[x][0] = 1;
               // arr[x][x] = 1;
            }

            for (int x = 1; x < i1 + 1; x++) {
                for (int y = 1; y < i2 + 1; y++) {
                    // System.out.println("came");
                    arr[x][y] = arr[x - 1][y] + arr[x - 1][y - 1];
                    arr[x][y] %= i3;
                }
            }


        /*    for (int p = 0; p < i1 + 1; p++) {
                for (int q = 0; q < i2 + 1; q++) {
                    System.out.print(arr[p][q] + " ");
                }
                System.out.println("");
            }
            /*
             * for(int x=0;x<i1+1;x++) { for(int y=0;y<i1+1;y++) { // arr[x][y]
             * = arr[x-1][y-1]+arr[x-1][y-1]; System.out.print(arr[x][y]+" "); }
             * System.out.println(""); }
             */
            System.out.println(arr[i1][i2] % i3);
        }



    }

    static int getcoeff(int i1, int i2) {
        int arr[][] = new int[i1 + 1][i1 + 1];
        for (int x = 0; x < i1 + 1; x++) {
            arr[x][0] = 1;
            arr[x][x] = 1;
        }

        for (int x = 1; x < i1 + 1; x++) {
            for (int y = 1; y < i1 + 1; y++) {
                if (x != y) {
                    arr[x][y] = arr[x - 1][y] + arr[x - 1][y - 1];
                    arr[x][y] %= 142857;
                }
            }
        }

        /*
         * for(int x=0;x<i1+1;x++) { for(int y=0;y<i1+1;y++) { // arr[x][y] =
         * arr[x-1][y-1]+arr[x-1][y-1]; System.out.print(arr[x][y]+" "); }
         * System.out.println(""); }
         */
        return arr[i1][i2] % 142857;
    }
}
